alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Habersham; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Franklin, Stephens, southeastern Habersham and southwestern Oconee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Toccoa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toccoa, Westminster, Gumlog, Martin, Avalon, Tugaloo State Park, Hollywood, Boydville, Eastanolee and Turnerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Georgia...and Upstate South Carolina.
